name: Storable and Member Data Element Initialization with Hard-Coded Literals
description:
Objective
Avoid hard-coded non-trivial values in the code

Consequence
Software featuring hard-coded pieces of information within its own code reduces adaptability

Measure Element
Number of instances where a literal value element is used to intialize a storable data element or member data element via a ‘Write’ action; exceptions are simple integers and static constant storable or member data elements

qualityRules.name: Quality Rules in numeric ID order
